meanings.definition: Already cut into slices before purchase or use.
meanings.sent1: The presliced apples made it easy to snack on them.
meanings.sent2: I bought presliced bread to save time in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The presliced cheese was so thin, it almost disappeared!
meanings.sent4: Her presliced watermelon smile brightened up the picnic.
meanings.sent5: The presliced vegetables looked like colorful puzzle pieces.
